body_html:
I just looked at the TF_SessionOptions, and the following likely won't be useful to you:

  • ConfigProto.placement_period This is only used internally
  • GraphOptions.infer_shape Mostly useful in Session._extend_graph in session.py (a deprecated API concept), but also annotates the NodeDefs returned by Session.graph_def (not sure how useful this feature is)
  • GraphOptions.timeline_step Experimental and only used internally.

Hope that helps. Thanks for bringing this up, and please close the issue if you don't have further questions/comments. Also FYI, we're working on moving the Python API to the new session API.

body:
I just looked at the TF_SessionOptions, and the following likely won't be useful to you:

- `ConfigProto.placement_period` This is only used internally
- `GraphOptions.infer_shape` Mostly useful in Session._extend_graph in session.py (a deprecated API concept), but also annotates the NodeDefs returned by Session.graph_def (not sure how useful this feature is)
- `GraphOptions.timeline_step` Experimental and only used internally.

Hope that helps. Thanks for bringing this up, and please close the issue if you don't have further questions/comments. Also FYI, we're working on moving the Python API to the new session API.
